Protocol v2.0

Overview

WARScribe is the standardized notation system for recording Warhammer 40,000 game actions. It provides an immutable, machine-readable format for tracking unit movements, attacks, and game state changes.

Notation Standard

All actions follow the format: [ACTION: Subject -> Target]

Common action types include MOVE, SHOOT, CHARGE, FIGHT, and ABILITY.

Move Format

Movement actions: [MOVE: UnitName -> Coordinates/Terrain]

Shooting actions: [SHOOT: UnitName -> TargetUnit | Weapon | Result]

Validators

The WARScribe validator checks all entries against the current game rules and unit datasheets. Invalid entries are flagged for correction.

Examples

[MOVE: Intercessor Squad -> Objective 1]

[SHOOT: Eradicators -> Leman Russ | Melta Rifle | 4 Wounds]

[CHARGE: Death Company -> Hormagaunts | Success]
